duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up, operate, monitor, troubleshoot, and perform preventive maintenance on assigned machines.
Inspect parts and make adjustments or tool changes to maintain quality specifications.
Assist with setting up and operating production equipment, following established procedures and guidelines, and adjusting machine settings to complete tasks accurately and in a timely fashion.
Perform pre-operation activities on multiple pieces of equipment to ensure proper equipment startup and operation.
Operate multiple pieces of equipment, monitor equipment during operation, perform setup and changeover, and inspect parts and make adjustments or tool changes to maintain quality specifications.
Perform scheduled quality assurance tests in accordance with Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) and communicate results with team members and support teams.
Perform housekeeping activities and sanitations on production equipment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, with 1 to 3 years of work experience
